qas.question: What was the worst economic year for Estonia after winning independence?
What year did Estonia reclaim their independence?
What event played a major part in the decline of the economy during 1999?
When did Estonia unite with the WTO?

context: In <a0_0>1999<a0_0/>, Estonia experienced its worst year economically since it regained independence in <a1_0>1991<a1_0/>, largely because of the impact of <a2_0>the 1998 Russian financial crisis<a2_0/>.[citation needed] Estonia joined the WTO in <a3_0>November 1999<a3_0/>. With assistance from the European Union, the World Bank and the Nordic Investment Bank, Estonia completed most of its preparations for European Union membership by the end of 2002 and now has one of the strongest economies of the new member states of the European Union.[citation needed] Estonia joined the OECD in 2010.
